H0.text: What is the ‘lead’ in pencils made from. Graphite Powder

H1.text: What is the ‘lead’ in pencils made from. Carbon Fiber

H2.text: What is the ‘lead’ in pencils made from. Silica

H3.text: What is the ‘lead’ in pencils made from. HOPG

A4.text: modern pencil lead is most commonly a mix of powdered graphite and clay

A5.text: It is chemically unrelated to the metal lead, whose ores had a similar appearance, hence the continuation of the name
